contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 19th day of November, 1992, the Order entered by this Court on December 30, 1987, is vacated, and respondent is hereby reinstated to the practice of law in this Commonwealth.
LARSEN, J., did not participate in this matter.
NIX, C.J., files a concurring statement.
PAPADAKOS, J., dissents.
